    • Constructor Detail

      • CanopyAssigner

        public CanopyAssigner(Instances headerNoSummary,
              java.lang.String csvParsingOpts,
              Canopy canopy,
              Filter preprocess)
        Construct a new CanopyAssigner
        Parameters:
        headerNoSummary - the structure of the data without summary attributes
        csvParsingOpts - the options for CSV parsing
        canopy - trained canopy clusterer to use for assigning canopies to instances
        preprocess - an optional preprocessing filter (missing values replacer + other filters that might have been used when the canopy clusterer was constructed).

    • Method Detail

                                      throws DistributedWekaException,
                                             java.io.IOException
        Process an instance
        Parameters:
        current - either an instance object or a string (CSV)
        Returns:
        an InstanceWithCanopyAssignments holder object
        Throws:
        DistributedWekaException - if a problem occurs
        java.io.IOException - if a problem occurs
